title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1805.2 - Changes in programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1805.2 - Changes in programs

State Regulations
(a) Any
change in an urban renewal, community renewal or concentrated code enforcement
program shall be filed with the commissioner. (b) No change in an urban renewal, community
renewal or concentrated code enforcement program assisted by State financial
assistance may be made without the approval of the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1805.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
